Package javelin.model.world.location.town

Class District

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.location.town.District
  • public class District
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Locations that can be found within a city's area. Since this search can be a relatively costly operation if performed repeatedly this serves as a discardable cache to be used within such an operations. Instead of performing a full search of the relevant data upon creation, data is only gathered when needed and then cached accordingly.
    Author:
    alex

      • getfreespaces

        public java.util.ArrayList<Point> getfreespaces()
        Returns:
        All spots that can be built on and do not have too many neighbors (as to prevent the creation of "walls" Squads will have trouble passing through). This list is shuffled by default.
